description:
He lives in the Holy City of Celestizam and is allowed to move about freely within its walls but he is forbidden to go outside the city. He often comments how he is a "caged bird" to Mathias, who is his mentor.
His second appearance in the anime is in episode 6, where he rescues Angelique from the persistent journalist Roche, who keeps trying to take photos of "The Queen`s Egg" to get a scoop.
He is revealed to be the future and true leader of the Religious Order. He declares that he will unite his power with Angelique`s to help save the world of Arcadia.
Source: Wiki
name: Rene
